title: MFM Minisode 40
description: On this week’s My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown stories from Detroit and Toronto including spooky happenings from a nurse, a fingerprint dust date night, a teen that worked with a serial killer, and more.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
